title: The Qualcomm DSP Driver - Unexpectedly Excavating an Exploit
summary: Posted by Seth Jenkins, Google Project ZeroThis blog post provides a technical analysis of exploit artifacts provided to us by Google's Threat Analysis Group (TAG) from Amnesty International.

title: New Developments in LLM Hijacking Activity
summary: Discover the latest in LLM hijacking activity, including a dive into the JINX-2401 campaign targeting AWS environments with IAM privilege escalation tactics.
